title: It needn't happen
creator_credit: Australian National Film Board and Tasmanian Government Film Unit
brief_description: Warns against accidents to small children in the home through the example of a little girl, the accidents that might have happened and how they could be prevented. Boiling water, medicine and sharp objects left within reach of the child, and over-boisterous games are all potentially dangerous.
